儽字的基本解释

儽
léi
〔儽儽〕疲惫、颓丧的样子。

儽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［léi］
［《廣韻》力追切，平脂，來。］
［《廣韻》盧對切，去隊，來。］
(1)颓丧。参见“儽然”。
(2)疲困；劳累。
(3)通“纍”。拘系。亦借指被囚禁的人。

儽字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　儽； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页122第08
【廣韻】【集韻】?盧對切，音壘。【說文】垂貌。一曰懶懈也。　又病也。【六書統】馮高衆立貌。

儽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
儽字的起名意思

暂无。

Humiliation
Basic explanation of words
Humiliation
léi
[儽儽] Weary and depressed look.
Humiliation
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［léi］
["Guang Yun" strives to pursue cutting, flat fat, come. ]
["Guangyun" Lu cut, go to the team, come. ]
(1) Depression. See "儽然".
(2) Tiredness; tiredness.
(3) Through "tired". Restrained. It also refers to a person imprisoned.

[Subset] [The Department of Human Characters] 　儽; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 122 08
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Lu cut, sound barrier. [Said the text] look down. One said laziness.　I'm sick again. [Six Books] Feng Gaozhong's appearance.
